business.headline: Living paycheck to paycheck: Analyst says India has worst family financial planningAn analyst said that in 2025 we need to teach kids not just how to earn money but how to manage it. He pointed out a common but dangerous mindset, the one with no room for budgeting, risk awareness, or financial learning.

RBI MPC: 25 bps rate cut on the cards? Here's all you need to knowSo far in 2025, the RBI has already cut the repo rate twice, once in February and then in April, by 25 bps each time. These cuts brought the key lending rate down to 6%.

NPS pensioners to get more benefits under Unified Pension Scheme. Details hereEligible NPS retirees can either get a one-time payment based on their last drawn Basic Pay and Dearness Allowance (DA) for every six months of service, or receive a monthly top-up if their current pension is less than what they'd get under UPS with Dearness Relief.

Leela Hotels share price: Stock lists at 7% discount on Dalal StreetThe company's stock opened at Rs 406 on the NSE, which is Rs 29 below the issue price of Rs 435. On the BSE, it opened slightly higher at Rs 406.50, still lower by Rs 28.50, or about 6.55%.

Sensex tumbles 700 points. Why is stock market falling despite strong GDP growth?The BSE Sensex was down 732.71 points to 80,718.30 around 9:25 am, while the NSE Nifty50 traded 197.45 points lower at 24,553.25. Most of the broader market indices also fell sharply amid a surge in volatility.

Leela Hotels vs Aegis Vopak listing: Which IPO will make stronger market debut?Leela Hotels and Aegis Vopak had their initial public offerings (IPOs) open for subscription from May 26 to May 28. While both IPOs were fully subscribed, they did not see very high demand during the bidding period.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as IT, metal stocks drag market despite good GDP dataThe S&P BSE Sensex declined 723 points to 80,728.03, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 191 points to 24,559.95 as of 9:25 am.

Stock market opening: Will Sensex, Nifty rally today after GDP numbers?India's economy grew by 7.4% in the January-March quarter, surprising many analysts. The growth was mainly driven by strong activity in the construction and manufacturing sectors.

Stocks to watch on June 2: IndiGo, Nykaa, Leela Hotels, Tata Motors, BPCLStocks such as Apollo Hospitals, IndiGo, Tata Motors, BPCL, Leela Hotels, and Aegis Vopak Terminals are expected to be in the spotlight, driven by recent news updates and their fourth-quarter earnings announcements.

Pankaj Tripathi joins Hyundai Motor India as brand ambassadorPankaj Tripathi is known for his roles in films and web series where he often plays characters that are relatable and grounded. Hyundai said this quality made him the right choice to represent the brand.

Air India in talks for another mega aircraft deal with Airbus, Boeing: SourcesThe plane orders come at a time when aircraft manufacturers are scrambling with supply chain issues leading to severe delays in aircraft delivery and a looming jet shortage.

Air India to move jet maintenance work from Turkey firm amid diplomatic tensionsAgainst the backdrop of Turkiye backing Pakistan and condemning India's strikes on terror camps in the neighbouring country in May, aviation security watchdog BCAS, on May 15, revoked the security clearance for Turkish company Celebi Airport Services India Pvt Ltd in the "interest of national security".

Fungus on food, expired goods: Zepto's Dharavi licence suspended over lapsesThe action against Zepto was taken after an inspection revealed fungal growth on food items, expired products, and unhygienic storage conditions.

IndiGo, Air France-KLM, Virgin Atlantic join hands to enhance travel to US, EuropeTo enhance air connectivity from India to Europe and North America, IndiGo, Delta Air Lines, Air France-KLM and Virgin Atlantic announced a partnership.

India orders IndiGo to end agreement with Turkish Airlines amid diplomatic tensionsThe Indian government has ordered IndiGo Airlines to terminate its damp lease agreement with Turkish Airlines by August 31. This decision comes in response to Turkey's continued support for Pakistan against India. The aviation regulator DGCA has granted a final three-month extension to the current lease, which was set to expire on May 31. IndiGo is currently operating two Boeing aircraft on damp lease from Turkish Airlines. The move is part of India's broader response to Turkey's actions, including supplying arms to Pakistan and condemning India's Operation Sindhu.

India reduces import tax on crude edible oils by 10% to bring down food pricesThe reduction in import tax will effectively bring down the total import duty on the three oils to 16.5 per cent from an earlier 27.5 per cent.

IndiGo to cut ties with Turkish Airlines amid row over Ankara's support to PakThe Directorate General of Civil Aviation said IndiGo gave an undertaking that it will terminate the lease with Turkish Airlines by August 31 and will not seek a further extension.

ITR-1 and ITR-4 Excel utilities out: Check who can file and what's new this yearExcel utilities for ITR-1 and ITR-4 are now available for AY 2025–26. Taxpayers can visit the income tax e-filing site to download and use them for filing returns for FY 2024–25.
Gensol misses May payment for loan on BluSmart cabs: ReportGensol Engineering reportedly missed a payment of about Rs 4 crore to its pass-through certificate (PTC) holders in May.
India's economic growth hits 4-year low of 6.5% in FY25The real GDP growth for the March quarter (Q4) stood at 7.4%, which is the fastest among all four quarters of the year.
Sensex closes 182 points lower, Nifty below 24,800; IT stocks drag marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 182 points to end at 81,451.01, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 82.90 points to close at 24,750.70.

From UPI withdrawals to online corrections: 5 expected features of EPFO 3.0EPFO's upcoming system aims to enhance financial flexibility for employees with features like instant UPI and ATM withdrawals, auto-claim settlements, and expanded withdrawal reasons.

Meet Leena Tewari, the USV chairperson who bought India's costliest flatsLeena is the chairperson of USV, a Mumbai-based pharmaceutical company, which was started by her late father, Vithal Gandhi, in partnership with Revlon in 1961. Forbes estimates Leena's net worth at $3.9 billion, as of May 30, 2025, making her one of India's richest women.

Explained: Why Arshad Warsi, wife Maria Goretti were banned by Sebi for 1 yearArshad Warsi and Maria Goretti bought shares of Sadhna Broadcast Limited (now known as Crystal Business System Ltd) from other individuals who were also named in the Sebi order.

How Trump's tariff tsunami is reshaping global economyIn just over four months, Trump's flurry of trade actions, alternating between shock-and-awe tariffs and strategic pauses, has upended conventional expectations.

Waiting for Form 16? Here's when will you get it and what to checkEmployers are required to issue Form 16 to employees if they've deducted TDS from their salary. It consists of two parts and shows how much salary was paid and how much tax was deducted during the year.

Arshad Warsi, his wife, among 59 people banned from stock market for 1 yearSebi said the group was part of a scheme to artificially raise the price of Sadhna Broadcast shares before selling them to unsuspecting retail investors.

Veteran investor explains why most investors fail in marketsAce investor Shankar Sharma said many investors fail to ask tough questions and instead rely on myths. He was critical of the belief that great investors can see into the future, dismissing it as an unrealistic myth.

India GDP data to be released today: What should investors expect?Earlier this year, the National Statistical Office had estimated that India's economy would grow by 6.5% in 2024–25, with an expected growth of 7.6% in the March quarter.

Ola Electric shares nosedive 10% after Q4 net loss. Should you buy, hold or sell?Ola Electric's Q4 numbers have laid bare the challenges facing India's EV poster child, from falling volumes and margin pressures to delays in execution. While the company's aggressive bets on electric motorcycles and rural expansion could pay off, the near-term outlook is murky.

Mazagon Dock shares snap winning streak, tumble 8%. Here's whyThe stock fell to an intraday low of Rs 3,450, retracing from Thursday's close of Rs 3,749. Around 10:07 am, shares of the company were trading 4.75% lower at Rs 3,574.40.

Suzlon Energy share price up 13% over strong Q4 results: Should you buy?Suzlon Energy stock price: The shares jumped as much as 13% in early trade, reaching an intraday high of Rs 74.30 on the BSE. This rise comes after Suzlon Energy Ltd announced a sharp rise in its quarterly profit.

Explained: Why Suzlon Energy shares rose 13% after Q4 resultsThe sharp rally came after Suzlon posted a 365% year-on-year jump in consolidated net profit for Q4FY25. Profit rose to Rs 1,182 crore from Rs 254 crore in the same quarter last year. Revenue from operations increased 73% to Rs 3,773 crore, compared to Rs 2,179 crore in the year-ago period.
Sensex opens 150 points lower; Nifty below 24,800; Infosys down over 1%The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 45.58 points to 81,587.44, while the NSE Nifty50 added 24.20 points to 24,857.80 as of 9:25 am.

Prostarm Info Systems IPO allotment: Step-by-step guide to check statusProstarm Info Systems was subscribed to nearly 100 times. The IPO opened for subscription on May 27, 2025, and closed on May 29, 2025.

Stock market opening: Sensex, Nifty likely to open higher today. Here's whyAt 8:14 am, Gift Nifty futures were trading at 24,950, suggesting a positive start above Thursday's Nifty50 close of 24,833.6. This indicates that markets may open with gains in early trade.

Stocks to watch on May 30: LIC, Baja Auto, Ola, Nykaa, Mazagaon Dock, IndiGoAs the week nears its end, investors will be looking out for key movements on Friday, May 30, especially as several companies are expected to release their quarterly earnings.
Elf beauty buys Hailey Bieber's Rhode in $1 billion dealElf will acquire Rhode for $600 million in cash and $200 million of newly issued shares of Elf Beauty common stock.

Mumbai's Dharavi to get a Rs 95,790 crore makeover in 7 yearsThe redevelopment is being led by a special purpose vehicle (SPV), Navbharat Mega Developers Private Limited (NMDPL), formed through a joint venture between the Maharashtra government's Slum Rehabilitation Authority (SRA) and the Adani Group's Dharavi Redevelopment Project Private Limited (DRPPL).

Mumbai's record home deal: USV's chairperson picks up duplexes for Rs 639 croreThese sea-facing homes are in the high-end 40-storey Naman Xana building on Worli Sea Face, offering stunning views of the Arabian Sea. The duplexes are spread across four floors – from the 32nd to the 35th, covering a total area of 22,572 sq ft.

entertainment.headline: Actor Parambrata Chattopadhyay, wife Piya welcome baby boy: Our hearts are fullActor Parambrata Chattopadhyay and wife Piya Chakraborty have welcomed their first child, a baby boy, in Kolkata. Parambrata shared the good news with his fans on social media.

Aryan Khan enjoys a game of paddle tennis with friends. WatchShah Rukh Khan's son, Aryan, recently enjoyed a game of paddle tennis with friends in Mumbai. A video of him playing the friendly match has gone viral.

Rejections to winning Roadies XX, the underdog story of Gullu from Elvish's teamKushal Tanwar, aka Gullu, from Elvish Yadav's team won 'MTV Roadies XX (Double Cross)'. Here's a glimpse into his dramatic journey from facing rejections to finally gaining fame.

Pakistan army uses Kashmir to line their pockets, looting nation: Adnan SamiAdnan Sami spoke about Pakistan, its army and the people who are suffering because of the establishment. The singer shared that the army is exploiting the Kashmir issue in front of the world.

I'll work as long as I can: Clint Eastwood is not retiring even at 95At 95, Hollywood director Clint Eastwood says he has no plans to retire and is already working on his next film. He believes in continuous learning and creating original stories, rather than relying on remakes or sequels.

Akshay Kumar takes charge as Housefull 5 Pune event turns chaoticAkshay Kumar, along with the entire team of 'Housefull 5', got together at an event in Pune. Amid all the craze for the upcoming film, a video showed fans getting emotional after seeing their favourite stars.

Wednesday Season 2: Release date, plot, cast, and Lady Gaga's mysterious roleThe popular Netflix gothic series 'Wednesday' returns with Season 2. The show will be released in two parts starting August 6, 2025, with darker twists, new mysteries, and familiar faces. Pop star Lady Gaga joins as a mysterious Nevermore teacher in Part 2.

Jackie Chan was 40 when he learnt his father was a spy: My original name is FongActor Jackie Chan recently dropped a bombshell after he revealed that his father worked as a spy for the Chinese government. He learnt about his father's secret when he was 40.

Kamal Haasan's birthday note to Mani Ratnam is love letter to their cinematic dreamFrom 'Nayakan' to 'Thug Life', Kamal Haasan says he and Mani Ratnam share a common cinematic dream. The actor posted a heartfelt birthday tribute to the legendary director.

Tamil director Vikram Sugumaran dies of cardiac arrest at 47Director Vikram Sugumaran was reportedly on his way back from Madurai when he experienced severe chest pain and was rushed to the hospital. He is survived by his wife and children.

Bhool Chuk Maaf box office Day 10: Strong second Sunday for Rajkummar Rao's film'Bhool Chuk Maaf' wrapped up its second weekend on a good note. The Rajkummar Rao and Wamiqa Gabbi-starrer has got four days to enjoy a smooth run at the box office before 'Housefull 5' hits the screens.

Elvish Yadav's gang member Gullu wins MTV Roadies XX, takes home bike, Rs 10 lakh MTV Roadies XX: This was Elvish Yadav's first season as a gang member, and his team's Gullu won it for him. The contestant took a cash prize of Rs 10 lakh and a bike.

Assam's 9-year-old Binita Chetry bags third place on Britain's Got TalentAssam's Binita Chetry secured third position on 'Britain's Got Talent' 2025 final. Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma congratulated the nine-year-old on her achievement on social media.

Comedian Gaurav Gupta's banter with Pak fan at US show: Chalo Hanuman chalisa padhoComedian Gaurav Gupta recently took a jibe at a Pakistani fan during a stand-up show as part of his US-Canada comedy tour, which led to mixed reactions.

Aamir Khan on unexpected romance with Gauri Spratt: We met by mistake and connectedActor Aamir Khan opened up on his bond with his partner Gauri Spratt. He recalled meeting her unexpectedly as he had not expected to find love again at this age.
Shah Rukh Khan's ripped and tattooed avatar leaves fans amazedShah Rukh Khan recently stunned fans with a new avatar, showcasing a muscular physique and flaunting his tattoos.

Bohot sharafat se... Actor Mumtaz recalls Yash Chopra's marriage proposalVeteran actor Mumtaz recalled once being proposed by the late filmmaker Yash Chopra. The 77-year-old spoke about her priorities at that time as an aspirational young actor.

Aamir Khan calls marriage to Reena Dutta jawani ka josh: Timing was a mistakeActor Aamir Khan reflected upon 16 years of marriage to Reena Dutta. The actor shared that he doesn't regret marrying Reena, because in her, he found a friend for life, but the timing of the marriage.

BTS kicks off 2025 FESTA with laughter, legacy, and Bangtan vibesBTS has launched the '2025 BTS FESTA' to celebrate their 12th debut anniversary, marking a heartfelt and playful reunion stage for the group post military service. The event sets the tone for an eagerly awaited full-group comeback later this year or early next year.

general news.headline: Russia's Pearl Harbour moment: 5 takeaways from Ukraine's stunning attackUkrainian special forces executed one of the largest and most complex drone-based special operations in modern warfare, destroying 41 Russian aircraft across multiple airbases using over 100 drones launched from disguised shipping containers.

PM Modi unlikely to attend G7 Summit in Canada, first miss in 6 years: SourcesAmid frosty ties between Ottawa and New Delhi, PM Modi is unlikely to visit Canada for the upcoming G7 Summit. Neither has the Canadian side approached India regarding the visit, nor is the Indian side inclined to attend, said sources, adding that the relationship must improve before any such high-profile visit takes place.

On camera, Karnataka man hacked to death with machetes inside bakery; 7 arrestedKarnataka police have arrested seven individuals for the public murder of a 35-year-old man in Koppal district, allegedly over a long-standing property and family dispute.

3 dead, 6 security personnel missing as landslide hits military camp in SikkimAs many as three people died and six security personnel went missing as a landslide, triggered by heavy rainfall, hit a military camp in Chhaten, North Sikkim.

There is too much trauma on TV and it is killing all the joyWatching any movie or TV series nowadays feels like a lesson in psychoanalysis, where all the motives, good or bad, must be explained by some sort of trauma, old or new. It makes watching TV joyless.

Anna University sex assault accused gets 30 years in jail, fined Rs 90,000A special court in Chennai sentenced the accused in the Anna University sexual abuse case, Gnanasekaran, to 30 years of imprisonment and imposed a fine of Rs 90,000 after finding him guilty on all eleven charges.

Gukesh reacts to epic win against Carlsen: 99 out of 100 times, I would loseD Gukesh and Magnus Carlsen showed contrasting reactions to their latest match in the Norway Chess. While Carlsen slammed the table and stormed off, Gukesh remained humble in perhaps the greatest win of his career.

I'm pregnant, was worried: Woman who hit auto driver with slippers apologisesA woman who attacked a Bengaluru autorickshaw driver with her slipper during an altercation publicly apologised on Sunday. She defended herself, saying she was afraid of having a miscarriage and expressed her love for the city and Kannada culture.

Father's health shapes a baby before it's even conceivedA growing body of research highlights the vital role of a father's health before conception in the baby's future. This shifts focus towards men's lifestyle and its lasting impact on pregnancy.

Unselfish Glenn Maxwell explains reason behind ODI retirementAustralia all-rounder Glenn Maxwell retired from the ODI format on Monday, June 2. Maxwell revealed that he did not want to hog his spot as Australia build up for the 2027 World Cup.

How Indian tried to get US Green Card through marriage scam, got caughtA 29-year-old Indian pleaded guilty to marriage fraud and identity theft to secure a US Green Card. After overstaying his J-1 visa, Aakash Prakash Makwana paid $10,000 to marry a US citizen and falsified documents to support the fraudulent marriage. When the plan failed, he falsely claimed domestic abuse to remain in the US.

Harvard graduate speaks on unity as men fight behind her in viral videoIn a striking twist of irony, Yurong "Luanna" Jiang was speaking about empathy during her interview with The Associated Press when a scuffle broke out in the background.

Video: Shreyas Iyer's outburst against Shashank Singh after victory vs MumbaiPunjab Kings (PBKS) captain Shreyas Iyer was seen fuming at teammate Shashank Singh following his match-winning innings against Mumbai Indians (MI) in the Qualifier 2 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Case against Virat Kohli's pub in Bengaluru for lacking designated smoking zoneBengaluru's Cubbon Park Police has registered a suo-motu case against the restaurant for violating provisions of the Cigarettes and Other Tobacco Products Act (COTPA).

JEE Advanced 2025 result out, Rajit Gupta tops with 332 marks. Full list hereThe Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kanpur has released the JEE Advanced 2025 results today, with Rajit Gupta from the IIT Delhi zone clinching the top spot. Candidates can now access their results at jeeadv.ac.in.

117 drones, 18-month planning: Zelenskyy details 'brilliant op' deep into RussiaA day before the scheduled peace talks, Ukrainian forces launched one of their most daring and successful attacks on Russian soil, striking dozens of strategic bombers at airbases located thousands of kilometres behind the front lines.

Baloch women now face brutality of Pakistani establishmentThe enforced disappearance of 24-year-old Mahjabeen Baloch last week marks an escalation. Baloch women are now being targeted by the Pakistani establishment in the same brutal way as Baloch men, children, and the elderly. There's a disturbing rise in enforced disappearances of women activists in Balochistan.

BJP's Dilip Ghosh skips Amit Shah's Bengal meet amid rift rumours: Wasn't invitedSenior BJP leader Dilip Ghosh was notably absent from the crucial organisational meeting attended by Union Home Minister Amit Shah, held ahead of the state elections.

Video: 4 on bike killed in deadly SUV crash on UP highway, riders flung into airIn the CCTV footage accessed by India Today TV, the four friends seated on an Apache motorcycle are seen overtaking a tractor before an SUV coming from the Gorakhpur side collides with them. At the point of impact, two were flung a few meters into the air before landing on the road.

People set on fire in Colorado attack; FBI calls it targeted terrorIn the video of the incident that went viral on social media, the suspect, Mohamed Sabry Soliman, can be seen shouting at pro-Israeli protesters, asking, 'How many children have you killed?' while holding a flamethrower in one hand and a Molotov cocktail in the other.

Pakistan army uses Kashmir to line their pockets, looting nation: Adnan SamiAdnan Sami spoke about Pakistan, its army and the people who are suffering because of the establishment. The singer shared that the army is exploiting the Kashmir issue in front of the world.

Left waiting in ambulance for hours, minor rape victim dies at Patna hospitalThe incident has sparked a major political row in poll-bound Bihar, with Leader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha, Rahul Gandhi, stating that 'minor Dalit girl in Muzaffarpur' died due to systemic apathy and medical negligence.

Katie Miller, Elon Musk, and Stephen: What's behind the buzz?Rumours claim Katie Miller left husband Stephen Miller for Elon Musk after Musk appeared with a black eye and Katie joined his team. But no official reports support the affair theory, and both Millers seem to remain united despite online buzz.

Emotional Preity Zinta celebrates with Shreyas Iyer after PBKS reach IPL 2025 finalAn emotional Preity Zinta celebrated with PBKS skipper Shreyas Iyer as Punjab reached the final of IPL 2025 with a five-wicket win over Mumbai Indians on Sunday, June 1. Punjab will face RCB in the final on June 3.

sports.headline: Unselfish Glenn Maxwell explains reason behind ODI retirementAustralia all-rounder Glenn Maxwell retired from the ODI format on Monday, June 2. Maxwell revealed that he did not want to hog his spot as Australia build up for the 2027 World Cup.

Iyer interrupts Ponting in a moment of epic class: Not coach, a winning coachIPL 2025: Shreyas Iyer went viral on the internet after he gave an interview with Ricky Ponting on the Indian Premier League website. In a moment of class, Iyer stopped Ponting from calling himself just the 'coach' of Punjab Kings.

IPL 2025: Shreyas Iyer, Hardik Pandya fined for slow over rate in MI vs PBKSIPL 2025: Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer and Mumbai Indians skipper Hardik Pandya were fined after their teams were pulled up for slow over rates during a rain-affected Qualifier 2 in Ahmedabad.

Glenn Maxwell announces retirement from ODI cricket to shift focus to T20IsStar Australia all-rounder Glenn Maxwell has announced his retirement from ODI cricket to shift his focus to T20Is, with the World Cup scheduled to be held in 2026. He retired with 149 appearances in the 50-over format, where he scored 3990 runs at an average of 33.81 with four hundreds and 23 fifties to his name.

What is Shreyas Iyer's biggest strength? ABD reacts to knock of IPL 2025Shreyas Iyer's played perhaps the knock of the Indian Premier League 2025 to storm his team into the final of the tournament. Sanjay Bangar and AB de Villiers were left awed by the batter's innings and spoke about his greatest strengths.

French Open Day 9: Djokovic, Sinner and Gauff eye quarter-finals berthThe Day 9 of the Roland Garros 2025 will feature several big stars in action as Novak Djokovic, Jannik Sinner, Alexander Zverev and Coco Gauff, amongst others, will grace the court.

IPL 2025: Forged by fire, Shreyas Iyer blazes through the battle for recognitionIPL 2025 Qualifier 2: In a high-stakes chase against Mumbai Indians, Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer showed he's hungrier than ever. After months of doubt, snubs, and whispers about his game, he let his bat do the talking - reminding everyone he'd only been waiting for the right moment.

Rajeev Shukla set to become BCCI President as Roger Binny nears age limit: SourcesRajeev Shukla is set to take over as the BCCI (Board of Control for Cricket in India) President as Roger Binny is nearing the age limit for holding the position as per the board's constitution.

Gukesh reacts to epic win against Carlsen: 99 out of 100 times, I would loseD Gukesh and Magnus Carlsen showed contrasting reactions to their latest match in the Norway Chess. While Carlsen slammed the table and stormed off, Gukesh remained humble in perhaps the greatest win of his career.

PBKS vs MI: Mahela Jayawardene rues dropped chances after losing Qualifier 2Mumbai Indians (MI) head coach Mahela Jayawardene was left ruing dropped chances following his team's five-wicket loss against Punjab Kings (PBKS) in Qualifier 2 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Shreyas Iyer's triple treat, MI's 200 fortress breached: IPL Qualifier 2 in statsShreyas Iyer made IPL history by becoming the first captain to lead three different teams—Delhi Capitals (2020), Kolkata Knight Riders (2024), and Punjab Kings (2025)—to the final. Meanwhile, Punjab Kings shattered Mumbai Indians' longstanding fortress by successfully chasing a record 204 runs in Qualifier 2, setting the highest-ever chase in IPL knockout history.

IPL 2025: Forged by fire, Shreyas Iyer blazes through the battle for recognitionIPL 2025 Qualifier 2: In a high-stakes chase against Mumbai Indians, Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer showed he's hungrier than ever. After months of doubt, snubs, and whispers about his game, he let his bat do the talking - reminding everyone he'd only been waiting for the right moment.

Rajeev Shukla set to become BCCI President as Roger Binny nears age limit: SourcesRajeev Shukla is set to take over as the BCCI (Board of Control for Cricket in India) President as Roger Binny is nearing the age limit for holding the position as per the board's constitution.

Gukesh reacts to epic win against Carlsen: 99 out of 100 times, I would loseD Gukesh and Magnus Carlsen showed contrasting reactions to their latest match in the Norway Chess. While Carlsen slammed the table and stormed off, Gukesh remained humble in perhaps the greatest win of his career.

PBKS vs MI: Mahela Jayawardene rues dropped chances after losing Qualifier 2Mumbai Indians (MI) head coach Mahela Jayawardene was left ruing dropped chances following his team's five-wicket loss against Punjab Kings (PBKS) in Qualifier 2 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Shreyas Iyer's triple treat, MI's 200 fortress breached: IPL Qualifier 2 in statsShreyas Iyer made IPL history by becoming the first captain to lead three different teams—Delhi Capitals (2020), Kolkata Knight Riders (2024), and Punjab Kings (2025)—to the final. Meanwhile, Punjab Kings shattered Mumbai Indians' longstanding fortress by successfully chasing a record 204 runs in Qualifier 2, setting the highest-ever chase in IPL knockout history.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
